Reviews.Title: ordered it for a friend as a gift'
Reviews.Author: deenishboodoo
Reviews.Content: we ordered this camera for someone as a gift and she can't stop talking about this camera, it works well and the quality off photos is amazing good quality for a small camera also we received this unit as promised and very good service guys .

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: shayphan
Reviews.Content: I got my new camera today. shipping was very efficient and on time. Everything promised in the package was delivered. Works really great so far. I certainly love love love my camera case. Awaiting another camera I bought from same store for my mom. will keep you guys updated.But I will gladly buy from this company AGAIN! tHANKS SO MUCH Beach Camera.!!!!!

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F Dual-View Smart Digital Camera (Black) Deluxe Bundle With 8GB card , Digpro Case And Cleaning Kit .
